title: Interpretation of seeing kissing on the cheek in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream According to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, there are many reasons that lead to dreams appearing during sleep, and the main and most likely reason is that the mind begins to organize the ideas it has collected and translates the incomprehensible feelings that a person feels during the day, and this knowledge begins after entering You are in a state of deep sleep that lasts for some time during the sleeping hours, so in this article we will tell you the interpretation of seeing kisses on the cheek. In a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream Al-Nabulsi’s Interpretation Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s victory over his enemies, and that he will benefit greatly when he defeats them. And if the dreamer sees that he is kissing a man on the cheek, this is a sign of Achieving the goal that the dreamer seeks, and this vision indicates the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is kissing a young girl on the cheek and this girl knows her, then this is evidence of the existence of an emotional relationship between the dreamer’s family and this girl’s family. Seeing kissing a dead person in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain many benefits from this dead person, and this benefit could be inheritance and money. The scholar Ibn Shaheen says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is kissing animals, this is evidence of the large number of hypocrites around him. So he warns of them and their deception. Interpretation of a dream about seeing kissing on the cheek in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is kissing a man, this is a sign that she is committing sins and disobedience, and that she is not performing the acts of worship imposed on her. And if she sees in her dream that her father or brother kissed her on the cheek This is a good vision that portends achieving the goals she aspires to and gaining great blessings in the coming period of her life. Seeing an unmarried girl kissing an unknown man in a dream means that she feels an emotional need, and desires the presence of someone who gives her love, affection, and attention. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the cheek In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is kissing her husband on the cheek, then this is a good vision and indicates the emotional stability that she experiences with her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband wants to kiss her but she is far away from him, then this indicates that there are many disagreements between them. He says Dream interpretation scholars: Seeing a married woman kissing a man who is not her husband is a sign that her husband does not care about her and she feels emotionally empty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is kissing her husband, this is a sign of love, tenderness, and a feeling of happiness in her life. Marital. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is kissing a small child on the cheek, then this is a good vision that portends a birth without problems and pain, and this vision also portends that God will take care of her health and the health of her child. And wellness. With health and saving them from all harm. Seeing a kiss in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the arrival of happy events and happy circumstances in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dream about kissing on the cheek

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a book in a dream from the great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a book in a dream: A book in a dream is a vision that means knowledge and understanding in general. Whoever sees that he is holding a book in his right hand, his vision indicates that God will reveal his sadness, and whoever sees that he is reading a book, this means that his problems will end and his worries will go away, and many other interpretations about We will mention the book in the essence of this topic. Seeing books in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dreaming of a book in a dream means an increase in knowledge, and whoever sees himself sitting among many books indicates an increase in knowledge and a high status, because books are a symbol of knowledge and prosperity, and the abundance of these books in a dream means an increase. In knowledge or increase in faith and vision holding a book in the left hand “with the left hand”. It means sadness or regret about something, and seeing a torn book is not good, unless it is a book that contains falsehood or evil, then the course of interpretation of the vision changes to indicate that it is far from falsehood. The book in the dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing a book in a dream for an unmarried girl means peace. And goodness in her life. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is reading a book indicates that she will acquire a very high degree of knowledge. Seeing reading the book of God Almighty in a dream, “the Qur’an,” means that the dreamer will marry a young man of good character and will make her very happy. Seeing an open book in a woman’s dream Unmarried means that her marriage is near. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sitting among a large group of books in her dream, then seeing it indicates her high status among people due to her abundance of knowledge. Ibn Shaheen said that seeing an unmarried girl reading a book in a dream is evidence of a connection. Close or near marriage. Seeing a big book in an unmarried girl’s dream means a great wish come true for that girl. A torn book in one’s dream indicates many problems and sorrows. An open book in a dream means kindness and livelihood represented by a good husband or academic success. Buying a book In a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying a book in a dream, then her vision indicates her success and distinction, whether in study or in the state of study or at work as well. Buying a book in a dream, then neglecting it, means that you are not following the right path. It was said in Seeing buying a book in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of that girl’s righteousness and her great knowledge and culture. It was said in the dream that the book was torn after buying it, it is a sign of anxiety. If an unmarried girl sees that she is buying a big book, this is a clear sign of more happiness. If A married woman saw her husband reading a book in a dream, then this is an indication of peace of mind and marital happiness. Carrying a book in a dream means maintaining morals and the desire to protect yourself from anything inappropriate. Seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman giving birth in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dream interpretation of a woman giving birth in a dream. Childbirth is the long-awaited stage for parents and loved ones who are impatiently waiting to see the fetus, after a journey of struggle that lasted nine consecutive months of pregnancy, which is the long-awaited period. The parents had been waiting a long time to see their child before their eyes and enjoy holding him in their arms and hearing the sound of his screams. They were also collecting the fruits of their marriage as they fell between them, after months of fatigue. , weakness and joyful waiting, and we learn about seeing a woman giving birth in our article, Interpretation of dreams of a woman giving birth in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a woman I know giving birth in a dream Childbirth is the most difficult stage that awaits every mother at the end of the months of pregnancy because of the severe pain that she endures and that no human being can bear, and even Childbirth pain is one of the second most difficult pains that any person feels, but the mother bears it for the sake of her child. The dreamer’s vision of a woman giving birth in a dream indicates the health and prosperity that the dreamer enjoys. Moreover, this vision brings him good news of getting rid of all pain and difficulties. And problems in his life. After all, this dream is a good omen for the dreamer to change his life for the better and change his situation in the near future. In addition, the dreamer seeing this dream shows her righteousness, closeness to God, and her adherence to her religion. Also, seeing a woman giving birth is a good omen for Achieving her goals and achieving her dreams and the things she seeks. Dreaming of a married woman giving birth in front of me. Birth does not come suddenly and immediately. Rather, the pregnant woman goes through many stages before it, including that she has completed the entire last month, and this is not required. Seeing a woman giving birth in a married dream means that she will get rid of Everything saddens her and she will go through difficult periods. In addition, this vision for a married woman portends the abundance of goodness, contentment, happiness and peace of mind that awaits her. Watching her give birth to a female means the end of her problems with her husband and the arrival of settlement and love. On the other hand, if the newborn is sick, this portends With the problems and difficulties that you may face in the future. On the other hand, the death of the fetus in a dream is a bad omen of infertility and lack of children in the future. See also: Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream. Labor begins with the pregnant woman feeling severe pain that begins gradually About a quarter of an hour between each injection, but over time the terrible pain increases. There is no time between each shot and the matter does not end. Rather, this great pain continues for several hours. A man who sees in a dream a woman who does not know how to give birth means that he will reach a high position and a great position. In addition, seeing an unmarried woman in this dream portends With her marriage and engagement in the near future. Even seeing an unknown woman giving birth during her dream is a good omen for the dreamer to hear happy and joyful news. On the other hand, the vision predicts problems, obstacles and difficulties that the dreamer will go through in his life. It is also good news for the owner, especially the single young man, about his marriage and engagement In the near future. Watch

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat holding my leg in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cat holding my leg in a dream If you are asking about the scholars’ interpretations regarding the interpretation of a dream about a cat holding my leg in a dream, we present in the following lines all of this and more. Interpretation of a dream about a cat holding my leg in a dream Interpretation of dreams about a cat holding my leg in a dream, it could be a cat biting my leg, indicating the betrayal of a person he trusts and God knows the unseen If the dreamer sees a cat biting my leg in a dream, this can lead to emotional crises and God knows the unseen If the dreamer sees a cat biting him, this may be evidence of failure and God knows best If a married woman sees a cat biting her leg, this may indicate failure in her life and God is Most High and All-Knowing Interpretation of a dream about a white cat in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a talking white cat in a dream can indicate a good future and God knows best When a single girl sees a talking white cat, it may express kindness and God knows best It can also express the ability to face problems and difficulties, and God is Most High and All-Knowing If the dreamer sees a white cat attacking him, it may be a sign of overcoming obstacles and problems and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my daughter in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my daughter in a dream Perhaps a cat attack means weakness and problems, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees a cat attacking her in a dream, this may be evidence of enemies, and God knows best. When a single girl sees a cat attacking her, this may lead to bad friends who are trying to make her fail, and God knows best. It can also indicate that a single girl sees a cat attacking her, but she pushes it away, perhaps meaning that she will be able to overcome problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my husband in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my husband in a dream Seeing a cat attack can indicate trouble, and God knows best If a married woman sees a cat attacking a person, this may cause trouble for him, and God knows best When you see a cat attacking you, it may express exposure to problems and judgments, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married man sees a cat attacking him, this may represent a malicious person, and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about a cat scratching my hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a cat on my hand in a dream can indicate bad things, and God knows best If a married woman sees a cat biting her hand, this may indicate betrayal, and God knows best When he sees A married man, a cat biting him on the hand, may represent betrayal by friends, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. It may also indicate illness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a white cat in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a white wild cat in a dream can be evidence of bad news, and God knows the unseen. A white cat can also express trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a white wild cat, it may lead to trouble, and God knows. If a young man sees a white wild cat, it may indicate hypocrites, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about a dead cat in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a dead cat in a dream can lead to liberation from financial crises, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream through the website Roy2a.com. The word “house” refers to any shelter that has walls in which a person lives and protects him from external factors. It is also called home. Most people change their homes from time to time due to changes in circumstances, and there are those who improve their situation and buy a new, larger and more beautiful home. What if the person, in my opinion, had a new home in a dream? This question is answered by the article by mentioning the most important interpretations of major scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream: Seeing a new house in a dream: Marriage. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition from one state to another, and this depends on the condition of the new house. A new house in a dream indicates upcoming wealth for the monarch, or a promotion in his job, or excellence in his studies, Or recovery from an illness. Seeing the building of a new house made of bricks. An indication of the fortuneteller’s diligence and efforts to earn a halal living. Seeing him building a house of gold in a dream. Unwanted visions and an indication of the dreamer’s hypocrisy and love of false appearances. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a complicated house in a dream. Interpretation Seeing a new house in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that I saw a house in a dream is a sign of a person’s health and well-being. Seeing a sick person’s new house is a sign of recovery. Seeing a new house is to expand one’s livelihood and many good deeds that will surpass those seen in reality. Seeing a new house is a sign of marriage, a new job, or a door to earning. Wealth opens to the viewer. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a fire in the house in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the new house in a dream for single women. She was residing there as a sign of her imminent marriage and living in her home. Seeing walking next to a new house for single women indicates success, happiness, and happy news that She will receive it in her life. Watching the offers of the girl’s new home in successes and achieving the goals and dreams she wants, whether on the personal, academic, practical, or scientific level. Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the new house for a married woman at the beginning of a new phase in her life, with food, happiness, and peace of mind. Seeing the spacious new house For a married woman, it indicates goodness, good offspring, and good deeds. If a married woman sees in a dream building a new house, it indicates her social status and good reputation in the world. Seeing a married woman indicates that she is building a new house for the wealth and luxury that she will experience in her coming days. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a lady House in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a new house for a pregnant woman is evidence that her fetus is male and that her birth will be easy and smooth. Seeing a new house for a pregnant woman in a dream about the happiness and goodness that comes in it and about the livelihood that opens up in it. Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a house A new, spacious dream in an absolute dream is a sign of a change in her situation for the better and an improvement in her situation

title: Washing the dead in a dream

preview.html: This is what we present to you through our website, and it is explained in the following lines according to the social position of the opinion. Follow us below. Interpretation of the vision of washing the dead in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a single person’s dream of washing the dead. As a symbol of cleansing from sins, returning to God, repentance, forgiveness and a lot of supplication. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is the one washing the dead. This foretells the challenges he faces and the issues he is going through and he will emerge safely. God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about burying a dead person. Interpretation of seeing washing a dead person in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of washing a dead person, this means that she is pure and righteous, as is always the case, as she does good and prays for it. In a dream, a married woman washing the dead is a sign of Overcoming stress and achieving psychological balance and calm. If a married woman dreams that her husband is bathing. This is not a good sign, because it indicates that her husband will die soon or that she will divorce him, and God knows best. If she sees her husband being bathed by someone in a dream, this indicates her repentance and forgiveness of her sins. In addition to sins, life and psychological stability change. The meaning of seeing washing the dead in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Washing the dead in a pregnant woman’s dream heralds good news for the day of her birth, which is an easy and natural day. According to the interpretation of seeing a dead child, washing the dead in a pregnant woman’s dream. Indicates the presence of difficulty. On the date of birth, but it will pass well. When a pregnant woman dreams that her husband is bathing while he is dying, this means that she is worried about the upcoming child, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of washing the dead in a dream for young men and its meaning: Bathing in a dream for young men represents the removal of worries, the success of projects, and the student’s success in studying. For For one who is about to get married, this indicates the satisfaction of his needs and the stability of his married life. As well as the fulfillment of debts if they are owed to a man. It is undesirable to wash the living dead in a dream for a young man, which indicates sins, disobedience and worries. If a young man is found bathing dead in A dream, then it can be read as a sign of good luck and livelihood. It is also reported that if a young man dreams of washing something, this means that God reminds him of his prayers and religion. If a young man finds himself cleaning his brother’s laundry in a dream, this indicates their love, God willing. Read also: Interpretation Ibn Sirin's detailed interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream is the interpretation of the vision of washing the dead by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin, the meaning of dreaming of washing the dead in a dream is to remove tension, depression, and remove sorrows. Seeing the recognized washing of the dead in a dream is evidence that the dead person has done what is right in the world and that his Lord has forgiven him. One of the desired visions that reflect the health of the dreamer’s condition and the joy of the deceased in the afterlife is washing the dead body and shrouding it in a dream. In a dream, the person who sees the dead body being washed indicates something terrible and a great calamity for him. It may be the death of a loved one, and God knows best. To dream of seeing a dead body during... Bathing in lukewarm water means true repentance and eliminating and avoiding defects. Interpretation of Nabulsi’s vision of washing the dead is considered a dream of seeing death

title: Interpretation of a lizard in a dream: Seeing a lizard being killed in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretation of a lizard in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, either hunting, killing a lizard, biting a lizard, eating the meat of a dead lizard, or buying food from the Al-Ali’s leopard. Al-Usaimi, by Ibn Sirin and others. Seeing a lizard in a dream or dream is considered one of the visions and dreams that can be interpreted for good or bad, but this depends on the nature of the dream and the dreamer’s circumstances. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin: In a dream, a transformed man, a Bedouin fighter, and seeing him is sick. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream: Seeing a lizard in a dream indicates an Arab Bedouin who deceives people with their money, and everyone who sees him gets sick and is said to be a cursed, evil person because he is a mutant and the lizard is a savage man. . Perhaps his vision indicates suspicion of profit or ignorance of the origin. Some scholars and commentators said: If one sees in a dream or dream of a lizard, or that he is chasing a lizard, or that a lizard is chasing a human being, then it is possible that this dream refers to a Bedouin who cannot be trusted . Some of them said that this dream indicates the deception of the Bedouins and the deception of one of the people.
Lib: D For a malicious, deceitful person. Interpretation of catching a lizard in a dream. It is also said that seeing a man who knows the dreamer catches a lizard in a dream or buys it, and it is possible that this dream indicates that this person does good to those who do good to him or harms those who insult him. Interpretation of buying a lizard in a dream, including Who also said: If he sees in a dream or dream that someone is buying, selling, or catching a lizard, it is possible that this dream indicates that this person does not deserve praise and should be cautious and careful. from him. In addition to the above, some scholars and commentators have said that if a person sees a lizard in a dream, he may have seen someone eating a lizard or chasing it.Interpretation of a dead lizard in a dreamAs for the interpretation of seeing a dead lizard in a dream, it is a sign of avoiding troubles and troubles and salvation for the dreamer from the distressed Almighty God or Distress or serious calamity. Interpretation of a lizard chasing me in a dream: Seeing a person in his dream as if he is being chased by a lizard, this is a message warning the dreamer of a malicious person in his life chasing him. Interpretation of eating a lizard in a dream. In addition to the above, some scholars and translators mentioned that if a person sees a lizard in a dream Or eat it or chase it, this dream may indicate that a person may suffer from an illness or face some problems and worries. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl or woman in her dream with a lizard or a lizard in her dream means that a man or young man is trying to deceive her. Or trap her while he is a malicious person trying to mislead her. Such as killing a lizard or feathers in her sleep, this indicates that this girl will get rid of some people who seek to destroy her life, frustrate her and keep her from achieving her goal. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman seeing a lizard or lizard in her dream, this is an indication that there is a person He has no morals in her life or in the life of her husband. He seeks to sabotage her life and destroy her life or her husband. Especially if he saw a married woman as if a lizard or lizard was entering from

title: Interpretation of clay in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of mud in a dream is one of the things that many believe is unpleasant visions, but in reality, seeing mud in a dream is something that deserves praise for its owner. The meaning varies from person to person depending on their situation and circumstances. The interpretation of a vision cannot be generalized to all people. In the following article, through the encyclopedia, we explain some different interpretations of seeing mud in a dream. Interpretation of mud in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets that he sees in a dream a person walking in the mud and the dreamer is suffering from an illness. Seeing a person walking in mud In the mud, but he comes out of it in the end. This dream is a sign of his recovery from many ordeals and evidence of his recovery from the disease, God willing. Interpretation of mud in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is walking on mud and while she is walking she feels heavy in her steps, then this vision is a sign Good because it shows sound thinking and a sound mind and that she is thinking about things correctly. The vision shows that she will achieve many things, and she hopes that he will reach a high level in society. A single girl sees mud in a dream and that her shoes are covered in mud and she was trying to clean the shoes. In this dream, it is an indication of This girl is trying to avoid bad things and that she is working all the time to correct her mistakes. Seeing an unmarried woman taking off her shoes in a dream and walking on wet clay indicates that she is working hard at something, and that she will succeed in the path she seeks. Seeing an unmarried girl often indicates She is wearing her shoes after she finishes walking in the street until her wedding date approaches and that she will get married in the same year as the vision that she saw, or it may be a sign that she will achieve great success in her life and that she will find a job. Interpretation of clay in a dream for a married woman. A married woman saw her children playing in the rain in a dream. There was mud in the place of play and this vision shows many good things for her and her children. If a married woman sees in her dream that her child falls into the mud wet from rain water and his clothes get dirty, then this dream has many good things because it indicates the abundance of life and the abundance of sustenance and it also shows He will. See a life full of prosperity. Seeing rain and mud in a dream, in this dream is good news that brings with it many good things, as seeing rain and mud indicates abundance of money and also shows that it will double her income. She saw her children playing in the mud and they were full of joy and happiness, and this dream It is a sign of family happiness and that the dreamer will soon have some pleasant things happen to her. Interpretation of mud in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is that she is not walking on mud while she is walking, or she feels heavy in her movement, or she falls in the mud, and in this vision her due date is approaching and her birth is approaching. Natural. Seeing clay in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of optimism and has many praiseworthy meanings. Commentators have indicated that seeing clay in a woman’s dream in general is evidence that the woman has a sound mind and sound thinking, as it indicates love and adoration. love

And whoever dreams that her husband gives her a gift of gold will soon become pregnant, God knows best. If a woman finds lost gold in a dream. It was good news that she will remove the worry, stop being sad and get out of crises, thanks to God. It symbolizes the loss of money and prestige and the loss of power and position, and God knows best. Wearing gold in a dream for a man is undesirable and indicates many worries. It was also said that gold is the foolishness of people in the dreamer's life. Giving and taking gold from a man in a dream is a sign of competition. And enmity between The dreamer and the influential. The meaning of seeing gold in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation. Interpretation scholars say that gold in a pregnant woman's dream indicates a male child. It was also said that she will give birth safely, God knows best. While seeing a pregnant woman wearing gold in a dream shows the difficulty and pain of pregnancy. But she will give birth to her fetus in health and peace, God willing. A gift of gold in a dream indicates comfort and confidence. Whether it is a lot of gold in a dream and envy. Wearing a veil, family problems and disputes. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for young people and its meaning. A lot of gold in a young man's dream indicates livelihood, joy, marriage and relief from worries.
